original_title: Pharoah Sanders - Live at JazzOpen Stuttgart Festival
overview: In the mid-nineties, the saxophonist was at the height of his art. Spiritual and terrestrial.  To many, he remains one of the true disciples of John Coltrane. A mystic impulse that harks back to the Gnawa healer-musicians with whom he engaged in a few historic sessions. Here, we find him in the midst of that period, in an epic concert with guitarist Jean-Paul Bourelly and drummer Trilok Gurtu with his magic sticks.  Tracklist:  1. Black Moon  2. Essence  3. Timetable Revolte
title: Pharoah Sanders - Live at JazzOpen Stuttgart Festival
